verses.verse: Now the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had said <S%H559><s%> to Abram, <S%H87><s%> Get <S%H3212><s%> you out of your country, <S%H776><s%> and from your kindred, <S%H4138><s%> and from your father's <S%H1><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> to a land <S%H776><s%> that I will show <S%H7200><s%> you:

And I will make <S%H6213><s%> of you a great <S%H1419><s%> nation, <S%H1471><s%> and I will bless <S%H1288><s%> you, and make your name <S%H8034><s%> great; <S%H1431><s%> and you shall be a blessing: <S%H1293><s%>

And I will bless <S%H1288><s%> them that bless <S%H1288><s%> you, and curse <S%H779><s%> him that curses <S%H7043><s%> you: and in you shall all <S%H3605><s%> families <S%H4940><s%> of the earth <S%H127><s%> be blessed. <S%H1288><s%>

So Abram <S%H87><s%> departed, <S%H3212><s%> as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%> to him; and Lot <S%H3876><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> with him: and Abram <S%H87><s%> was seventy <S%H7657><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> when he departed <S%H3318><s%> out of Haran. <S%H2771><s%>

And Abram <S%H87><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> Sarai <S%H8297><s%> his wife, <S%H802><s%> and Lot <S%H3876><s%> his brother's <S%H251><s%> son, <S%H1121><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> their substance <S%H7399><s%> that they had gathered, <S%H7408><s%> and the souls <S%H5315><s%> that they had gotten <S%H6213><s%> in Haran; <S%H2771><s%> and they went <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> to go <S%H3212><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan; <S%H3667><s%> and into the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%> they came. <S%H935><s%>

And Abram <S%H87><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> through the land <S%H776><s%> to the place <S%H4725><s%> of Sichem, <S%H7927><s%> to the plain <S%H436><s%> of Moreh. <S%H4176><s%> And the Canaanite <S%H3669><s%> was then <S%H227><s%> in the land. <S%H776><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> to Abram, <S%H87><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> To your seed <S%H2233><s%> will I give <S%H5414><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> land: <S%H776><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> he an altar <S%H4196><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> who appeared <S%H7200><s%> to him.

And he removed <S%H6275><s%> from there <S%H8033><s%> to a mountain <S%H2022><s%> on the east <S%H6924><s%> of Bethel, <S%H1008><s%> and pitched <S%H5186><s%> his tent, <S%H168><s%> having Bethel <S%H1008><s%> on the west, <S%H3220><s%> and Hai <S%H5857><s%> on the east: <S%H6924><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> he built <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> on the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
And Abram <S%H87><s%> journeyed, <S%H5265><s%> going <S%H1980><s%> on still <S%H5265><s%> toward the south. <S%H5045><s%>

And there was a famine <S%H7458><s%> in the land: <S%H776><s%> and Abram <S%H87><s%> went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to sojourn <S%H1481><s%> there; <S%H8033><s%> for the famine <S%H7458><s%> was grievous <S%H3515><s%> in the land. <S%H776><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when <S%H834><s%> he was come <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> to enter <S%H935><s%> into <S%H935><s%> Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> that he said <S%H559><s%> to Sarai <S%H8297><s%> his wife, <S%H802><s%> Behold <S%H2009><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> I know <S%H3045><s%> that you are a fair <S%H3303><s%> woman <S%H802><s%> to look <S%H4758><s%> on:

Therefore it shall come to pass, when <S%H3588><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4713><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> you, that they shall say, <S%H559><s%> This <S%H2063><s%> is his wife: <S%H802><s%> and they will kill <S%H2026><s%> me, but they will save <S%H2421><s%> you alive. <S%H2421><s%>

Say, <S%H559><s%> I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, you are my sister: <S%H269><s%> that it may be well <S%H3190><s%> with me for your sake; <S%H5668><s%> and my soul <S%H5315><s%> shall live <S%H2421><s%> because <S%H1558><s%> of you.

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, that, when Abram <S%H87><s%> was come <S%H935><s%> into Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4713><s%> beheld <S%H7200><s%> the woman <S%H802><s%> that she was very <S%H3966><s%> fair. <S%H3303><s%>

The princes <S%H8269><s%> also of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> her, and commended <S%H1984><s%> her before <S%H413><s%> Pharaoh: <S%H6547><s%> and the woman <S%H802><s%> was taken <S%H3947><s%> into Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%> house. <S%H1004><s%>

And he entreated Abram <S%H87><s%> well <S%H3190><s%> for her sake: <S%H5668><s%> and he had <S%H1961><s%> sheep, <S%H6629><s%> and oxen, <S%H1241><s%> and he asses, <S%H2543><s%> and menservants, <S%H5650><s%> and maidservants, <S%H8198><s%> and she asses, <S%H860><s%> and camels. <S%H1581><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> plagued <S%H5060><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> and his house <S%H1004><s%> with great <S%H1419><s%> plagues <S%H5061><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> <S%H1697><s%> of Sarai <S%H8297><s%> Abram's <S%H87><s%> wife. <S%H802><s%>

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%>and said, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> is this <S%H2063><s%> that you have done <S%H6213><s%> to me? why <S%H4100><s%> did you not tell <S%H5046><s%> me that she was your wife? <S%H802><s%>

Why <S%H4100><s%> said <S%H559><s%> you, She is my sister? <S%H269><s%> so I might have taken <S%H3947><s%> her to me to wife: <S%H802><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> therefore behold <S%H2009><s%> your wife, <S%H802><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> her, and go <S%H3212><s%> your way.

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> his men <S%H582><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> him: and they sent <S%H7971><s%> him away, and his wife, <S%H802><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that he had.
